Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94, 130th and Eberhart due to police activity near 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94, 130th and Eberhart due to police activity near 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Sox-35th and 95th
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Sox-35th and 95th due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Sox-35th and 95th due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and Sox-35th at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Sox-35th and 95th to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
